short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DrWally is a WhatsApp Web extension that allows you to connect to your WhatsApp account and send messages to your contacts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DrWally is a WhatsApp Web extension designed to make it easier for business owners to communicate with their customers, saving time and streamlining workflows.

The app allows you to connect to your WhatsApp account and send messages more efficiently, including the ability to schedule messages for specific times. You can send messages not only to individual contacts but also to WhatsApp groups or multiple users simultaneously.

DrWally is the perfect solution for businesses that rely on WhatsApp to engage with their customers, enhancing service quality and maintaining consistent communication with ease.
